name: playwright-js-bdd-tests

scripts.generate:allure-report:web: npx allure generate allure-results/chromium allure-results/firefox allure-results/webkit --clean -o allure-report
scripts.generate:allure-report:mobile: npx allure generate allure-results/android allure-results/ios --clean -o allure-report
scripts.debug:chromium:tags: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='chromium' PARALLEL=1 npx cucumber-js --parallel 1 --require support/world.js --require steps --tags
scripts.test:chromium:tags: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=chromium npx cucumber-js -p chromium --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "$TAGS"
scripts.test:firefox:tags: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js -p firefox --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "$TAGS"
scripts.test:webkit:tags: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js -p webkit --require support/world.js --require steps --tags "$TAGS"
scripts.test:chromium:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='chromium' npx cucumber-js -p chromium --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke-web'
scripts.test:firefox:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='firefox' npx cucumber-js -p firefox --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke-web'
scripts.test:webkit:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web BROWSER='webkit' npx cucumber-js -p webkit --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@smoke-web'
scripts.test:crossbrowser:smoke: TEST_LEVEL=web HEADLESS=false npm-run-all remove-allure-sh --parallel test:chromium:smoke test:firefox:smoke test:webkit:smoke
scripts.test:crossbrowser:smoke:headless: TEST_LEVEL=web HEADLESS=true npm-run-all remove-allure-sh --parallel test:chromium:smoke test:firefox:smoke test:webkit:smoke
scripts.test:android:tags: TEST_LEVEL=android npx cucumber-js -p android --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags
scripts.test:android: TEST_LEVEL=android npx cucumber-js -p android --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags '@android'
scripts.test:ios:tags: TEST_LEVEL=ios npx cucumber-js -p ios --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags
scripts.test:ios: TEST_LEVEL=ios npx cucumber-js -p ios --parallel 1 --require steps --require support/world.js --tags '@ios'
scripts.test:api:tags: TEST_LEVEL=api npx cucumber-js -p api --require support/world.js --require steps --tags
scripts.test:api: TEST_LEVEL=api npx cucumber-js -p api --require support/world.js --require steps --tags '@api'
scripts.docker-remove-all: npm run docker-remove-images && npm run docker-remove-containers && npm run docker-compose-down
scripts.docker-compose-run-tests-args: OPEN_ALLURE=false BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=false TAG='@sign-in' npm run docker-compose-run-tests
